lines.text:
[in elevator at Niagara Falls hotel]
You just get here honey?

[Opening lines after passin Jean on the street]
Good luck!
Hello! I'd like to ask you a proposition

[Offended that he has misinterpreted]
A BUSINESS proposition!

[to David]
I wish I could understand you. You're either crazy or running away from something.

[after catching Jean and David in a hotel room]
It's nice, very nice! Well, one of you better start lying!
I've never heard that celebrities are to be trusted in their relationships with women more than anybody else.
That institution, like the Coliseum in Rome, is still standing, but it is certainly showing the ravages of time.
